#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main(){
	int n ; 
	cin >> n ; 
	string s; 
	cin >> s ; 
	float a,f,b;
	b= 0.0;	 
	cin >> a>> f ;
	for (int i =0 ; i < n; i++){
		if(s[i]=='L'){
			b= b-a;
		}
		else {
			b= b+a;
		}

		if(b>=f || b<=(-f)){
			cout << "NO"<< endl;
			return 0;
		}
	}
	cout << "YES"<< endl;
	return 0 ;

}
